Evening All: In ubuntu server, I have multiple network interfaces. Each interface is on its own internet connection. is there anyway I can do a command in any CLI ftp client to specify which interface to use ?
do and ifconfig this should show you all of you interfaces installed in the machine both live and dormant als use a netstat -i
do and ifconfig this should show you all of you interfaces installed in the machine both live and dormant als use a netstat -i will aslo list all of the interfaces in you machine.
